latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service staff identified/acting as group teachers do not meet the required qualifications of the position
Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations

violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations

violations.Violation Summary: Required food protection procedures were not implemented at time of inspection Holder of food protection certificate was not on site during hours of food preparation activity
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Criminal and child abuse screening documentation not submitted during application process
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Permittee/applicant submitted incomplete written safety plan
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to notify DOHMH within 24 hours of child abuse allegation/indication or record of criminal activity of individuals associated with child care service serious injury death or loss of a child
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hand wash sinks are not supplied with an adequate amount of running water At time of inspection water temperature exceeded 115 deg Fahrenheit
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service facility observed not maintained or in disrepair Dry sweeping observed in areas occupied by children
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection children were observed occupying space not previously approved by the Dept of Buildings FDNY and/or DOHMH
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Exits and other egress not provided with required signage at time of inspection
